key_risks: Regulatory and safety challenges, including delays in autonomous truck testing until 2025
High R&D costs and profitability concerns, with Q1 2024 R&D expenses at $135 million
Intense competition from established players like Waymo, Cruise, and Tesla
Dependence on partnerships with automotive manufacturers and logistics companies
Leadership and governance changes, including Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi's resignation from the board
controversies: Public perception of autonomous vehicle safety, exacerbated by high-profile accidents in the industry
Delayed commercialization of autonomous truck testing due to regulatory hurdles
social_issues: Public safety concerns related to autonomous vehicle technology
governance_issues: Leadership changes, including the resignation of Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi from the board
